title: AM Spiel: Cruz Control
description:
Day 3 of the Republican National Convention brought a Ted Cruz crescendo, a little Cruz-splaining.

itunes:subtitle: Ted Cruz’s cry to “vote your conscience” dealt another distraction to the chaos-loving Trump campaign.
